recipe.name: Mac & Cheese
recipe.ingredients: 5 cups of milk, 1lb elbow macaroni, and 2 cups shredded cheddar cheese.
recipe.step1: In a large pot, bring the milk to a boil
recipe.step2: Add the pasta and stir constantly until the pasta is cooked, about 10 minutes
recipe.step3: Turn off the heat, then add the cheddar. Stir until the cheese is melted and the pasta is evenly coated.
